name: Word City: Connect Words Game
description:
Word City: Connect Words Game is a combination of creative crossword puzzle games and word searches, which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. If you want to win, you need to find all the words hidden in the crossword. Challenge yourself and train your brain.

HOW TO PLAY
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

FEATURES
• Hundreds of unique challenges
• Free Daily bonus rewards
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• Great exercise for the brain
• Play OFFLINE in anytime and anywhere.
* Travel Theme with unique cities from all over the world

Game musics and sounds are from zapsplat.com, freemusicarchive.org, www.bensound.com, www.purple-planet.com
